column5: My wife and a few of her Co workers got together and decided for a Xmas gift to get there husbands fishbum clothing.  Ordered back in Nov with delivered promises for Christmas.  Deadlines run out and several sorrys later they promised a 60.00 "gift pack" and the t shirt the jacket was suppose to come with for non Christmas delivery.  I just got my coat end of January ,Co workers havnt received there goods yet,and surprise surprise no thank you gift pack or t shirt .   There customer service is crap,maybe there on the way out Buyer BEWARE !!!!!
That sucks.  Post this on their facebook page and I'll bet they will try to fix this for you asap.
Tempting. ..don't have FB but I'll make sure people find out
Tempting. ..don't have FB but I'll make sure people find out If the Mrs does then get her to

That sux big time!  I deal with TD Canada Trust.  If I shop on line or any where else & use my TD visa card or debit card the bank will guarantee my money is safe against fraudulent transactions.  If this applies to you, make sure you still have your emails from that company they usually send when your order was placed,when it was shipped & any transaction numbers that usually accompany such emails.  Good luck!
Sorry, but what exactly is "fishbum" clothing? Never heard of such a thing!
Sorry, but what exactly is "fishbum" clothing? Never heard of such a thing!  they make stuff like this
blow em up on social media, i think you will get a very good response. They are all over facebook and stuff. if you make them look bad there they will fix the problem.
Just read a FB post between them and one of my FB friends. Exact same issue,  seems like their customer service is crap. Thanks for the heads up.

Same thing happened here.  my wife ordered a "king" jacket mid november  ish for me for xmas.  Nothing, then promised it would be delivered after xmas.  Nothing not even an email unless we contacted them.  Sorry the items arent in yet  was all we got.  Finally close to the end of Januaray we recieved the item.  Heard a few stories like yours and mine.  Better to buy fishbum merch from outlets like bass pro  or where ever, that way it will say if its in stock or not, rather from the site itself.  That said, the do carry a great product and the price point for there product is spot on imo.
Lol, looks like thaclothing professional UFC etc Fighters wear.  Sounds like some horrible service that's for sure

Why would you still buy there product knowing there is a problem.... only way to fix the problem is ..... do not buy their products.... this will get their attention when sales drop.... customer service or go broke.....

That's karma!!!!!!!! Ahahahahahahajaj lololololololl @ you
Guess I missed something???  Dood got crappy service. No excuse for that

Have delt with them for many years now....growing pains I beleive. Back when they released their stick worms they shipped my order twice. Bonus for me lol  Then in Oct I ordered a Blue jay inspired T it never came...I gave it time when I contacted them the shipping dept had trouble locating my order...they no longer had the shirt in stock so they shipped me out a $100 hoodie to make good.  it's unfortunate that these things happen, a couple local Canadians seemed to have got a good thing going but the shipping woes are definitely a black eye.
I see they have a 705 phone number. Anyone know where they are located?
I see they have a 705 phone number. Anyone know where they are located?  Dwight, Ontario
I don't often order fishing clothing on the internet.  But when I do I always order from HUK ! ! !

Sound like a small business going through the learning curve. I'm not a fan of their stuff but I know a bunch of guys that are. Hopefully they bounce back. I like to see small Canadian businesses do well

Lol, looks like thaclothing professional UFC etc Fighters wear.  Sounds like some horrible service that's for sure  It's for when you're combat fishing Bronte and the Credit for some street-fighting salmon. Only the tough ones make it past the snaggers, so you need to be ready for a brawl.
